channel.title: Route53 on Richard Standow
channel.description: Recent content in Route53 on Richard Standow

item.title: Hitechmadeez Website
item.description: HiTechMadeEZ.com HiTechMadeEz is a website I created that will provide a variety of resources to people and help educate friends and family members about using technology. I have changed my mind several times on how I want to approach this goal of education and whom is my audience. At first, I used AWS did a full-scale backend. Route 53 as my DNS, load balancer, EC2 LAMP stack then AMI image of Plesk, CloudFront, S3.
